text: Great presenters are great storytellers.  They also include zombies and polar bears, just sayin'.  Thank you, @holly_cummins - you've given everyone at #DevoxxUK so much good advice to consider https://t.co/56aMruLzw9

author.name: Peter Hicks (he = Peter, they = Poggs)
author.description: Director of OpenTrainTimes, vaccinator, phlebotomist, vegan, considerate cyclist, Open Data advocate, Dad-joke teller, cat and Italian Greyhound lap provider
